GSD.description:
cifs: fix handlecache and multiuser

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit e71f6a3a1d5c826a30384fec587ca7503ef6bde5. For more details please see the references link.
